dict.string: - The Top Lists profile now includes the elpased time since the last profile reset. - Growl track notification layout change. - Bug Fix: Top Tracks search field was mis-behaving. b1: - A profile reset now requires confirmation. - Bug Fix: The auto version update check is now silent if there is no update. - Bug Fix: It was possible for the submission countdown in the Stats window to get confused and display a completely invalid time. - Bug Fix: The authentication warning dialog will now display when necessary.
